short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly generate QR codes from selected text or URLs. Clean, fast, and easy to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform text and URLs into QR codes instantly with QRUE - the quick and efficient QR code generator that respects your privacy.

KEY FEATURES:
• Instant QR code generation from selected text or current URL
• One-click access from toolbar or Alt + Q shortcut
• Dark mode support for comfortable viewing
• Download QR codes as PNG images
• Print QR codes directly
• Bulk QR code generation for multiple lines
• Copy QR codes to clipboard
• Privacy-focused: works offline, no data collection

PERFECT FOR:
• Sharing URLs between devices
• Quick mobile access to text information
• Creating QR codes for business cards
• Generating multiple QR codes quickly
• Sharing contact information
• Event registration links
• Product information sharing

PRIVACY FIRST:
• No data collection
• Works completely offline
• No external servers
• No tracking or analytics
• Your data stays on your device

EASY TO USE:
1. Select text (or don't, to use the current URL)
2. Click the extension icon (or press Alt + Q)
3. Your QR code appears instantly
4. Download, print, or copy with one click
